name: Evidence.topic
title: Evidence.topic
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: The category of the Evidence, such as Education, Treatment, Assessment, etc.
element.definition: Descriptive topics related to the content of the Evidence. Topics provide a high-level categorization grouping types of Evidences that can be useful for filtering and searching.
element.requirements: Repositories must be able to determine how to categorize the Evidence so that it can be found by topical searches.

binding.description: High-level categorization of the definition, used for searching, sorting, and filtering.
